waterLevel.mainContent:
• Ref Value #1 & 2: The depths in 'mm' manually marked on the sensor cable as reference points.
  • Logger Reading #1 & 2: The value shown on the view tab of the Xtract app when the sensor is submerged to each ref value depth.
  • Temperature: The temperature value shown on the view tab of the Xtract app during calibration.
  • Sensor Length: The specified length of the the sensor cable (not including the logger) as shown on the label. IMPORTANT! Changing the sensor length requires a re-calibration of the logger.
